name: Strongholds
description:
First of all, thank you for joining us on our journey through Strongholds. We are really glad to actually release the Closed Beta. As you probably see the game's Beta is totally free with the request of a Code though that is most likely given, although with you paying some money we can guarantee access to ALL CLOSED BETA PHASES, FINAL STRONGHOLDS GAME and a Limited Edition Printed copy*. Support us by donating some money to the Project.

*The Limited Edition Printed Copy is given to whoever donates 9.99 and up
